issue.title: [FlightRPC][Java] Fix NPE when using FlightProducer without interceptors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10491](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10491). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is an NPE when trying to use RequestContext when using a FlightService without FlightServer. It's because the RequestContext for the peer identity doesn't have a default.
